summary: The implementation successfully delivers all 11 requirements (REQ-10 through REQ-20) for the discussion board feature. Backend data models, CRUD operations, and admin access control are properly implemented. Frontend components for post listing, thread details, question submission, and admin replies are complete with proper authentication checks, loading states, and toast notifications. React Query hooks manage all data operations with cache invalidation. Brand styling is consistently applied throughout. All routes are integrated and publicly accessible.
